show_name: Eden of the East: The King of Eden (movie)
other_title: Eden of the East the Movie I: The King of Eden
Higashi no Eden Gekijōban I: The King of Eden (Japanese)
東のエデン 劇場版Ⅰ The King of Eden (Japanese)
plot: The story continues where it left off from the Eden of the East TV series, and brings Morimi Saki back to the USA in order to find Takizawa Akira. The other Selecao however are actively moving to take part in the game, and a few in particular are making dangerous moves in order to eliminate Takizawa or move towards their picture of a better Japan.
